inclusion.criterion: diagnosed with schizophrenia by DSM-5 or ICD-10
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: current episode of psychotic symptoms with disease course less than 3 years and intermission less than 6 months
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: at least 1 guardian to accompany patient within 1 year
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: signed the study consent for participation
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: known or suspected clinically unstable systemic medical disorder
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: current or prior DSM-5/ICD-10 diagnosis of substance use disorder, intellectual disability, autism spectrum disorder, dementia or severe cognitive impairment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: planning to be pregnant, pregnancy or breast-feeding
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: currently enrolled in another clinical trial
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has type 1 diabetes and cardiomyopathy, but no other significant medical issues. He is taking insulin and vitamin D supplements.
